directions.step:
Pulverize the bread in a blender or food processor. Transfer to a medium bowl. Add the oil, thyme and paprika. Press into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch pie plate. Bake at 400 degrees F for 7 minutes.
In a food processor, puree the cottage cheese, egg substitute and Sapsago or Parmesan. Transfer to a large bowl.
Pat the artichokes dry with paper towels. Cut the hearts into bit-size pieces. Stir into the cheese mixture. Pour into the pie shell.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 30 minutes, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. To serve, cut into thin slices. Serves 8.
